name: Stalked (itch) (Lone Axe Games)
description:
(A Psychological horror game) 'Stalked" is a short first person psychological Horror game, where you play as Sarah Garrett, An investigative journalist being stalked in the middle of the night.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay: ∎Creepy Neighborhood with tension build-up ∎No random Jumpscares ∎Cardboard cutouts and more hilarious things ∎Music that will make your ears bleed with immersion /Voice Acting ∎Multiple Endings / Leaving Options -------------------------------------------------------- Average playtime maybe between 1 hour and more depending on pace and how much you explore
